name: fetch-transfer-progress-demo
description: Demo of fetch-based upload/download progress tracking with a simple server

scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.setup: npm run generate-cert && mkdir -p src/server/uploads && [ ! -f src/server/uploads/demo-file.bin ] && dd if=/dev/zero of=src/server/uploads/demo-file.bin bs=1024 count=51200 || echo 'Demo file already exists'
scripts.generate-cert: if [ -f src/server/server.key ] && [ -f src/server/server.crt ]; then echo 'Certificates already generated'; else mkcert -key-file src/server/server.key -cert-file src/server/server.crt localhost; fi
